sections.heading: Clerk; liability for acts of deputy
sections.text: Every clerk appointing a deputy under the provisions of section 24-401 shall be liable for all the official acts of said deputy clerk.SourceLaws 1879, § 44, p. 92;R.S.1913, § 1195;C.S.1922, § 1118;C.S.1929, § 27-402;R.S.1943, § 24-402.
